unittitle_ssm: Celestine De Martini Brooklyn Navy Yard collection
abstract_ssm: The collection contains 3 items: a Recognition of Service certificate awarded to Celestine De Martini, acknowledging his service as a civilian employee of the U.S. Navy during World War II; a photograph of Lieutenant Vance A. Tribbett, officer in charge of the Materials Inspection Department at the Brooklyn Navy Yard; and a photograph of employees of the Navy Yard Materials Inspection Department, including Angelo Iovine, Charles Rosario, and Jack Barnes. The latter photograph was taken outside the Navy Street Housing Project.
subject_ssm: Civilian employees of the United States Armed Forces
collection_ssm: Celestine De Martini Brooklyn Navy Yard collection
